title: House for Sale - Maharagama
details:
HOUSE FOR SALE – MAHARAGAMA
18 perch Land, 2 storey main house with an annex.
4 bed room, 3 bath room, large front garden and garage.
3000sqfeet.
20ft wide access road.
700m to Maharagama town and High Level Road and schools.
5 minutes to Super Market and Royal Institute.
Rs. 23 million ( 230 Laks ) Negotiable.
Contact : 071 8011853 / 077 2961121.
